patthana1.19:8.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:8.2: paccuppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:10.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:10.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ … pe …
patthana1.19:10.4: paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.19:10.5: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.19:10.6: Atītaṃ cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.19:10.20: atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā …
patthana1.19:10.22: domanassaṃ uppajjati, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:10.24: Atītā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:11.1: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:11.5: anāgate khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.19:11.8: Anāgatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:12.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:12.13: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.19:12.17: paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:14.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:14.5: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.19:14.6: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.19:14.16: atīte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana1.19:15.1: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:15.6: anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana1.19:16.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:16.7: paccuppanne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.19:16.9: paccuppannādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:18.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:18.2: purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:18.10: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:20.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:22.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:24.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:24.5: atītaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ …
patthana1.19:24.8: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.19:24.16: kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ … pe …
patthana1.19:25.1: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:25.17: anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ …
patthana1.19:25.25: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:26.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:26.5: paccuppannaṃ utuṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.19:26.7: paccuppannaṃ bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādeti … pe …
patthana1.19:28.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:28.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.19:30.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:30.2: pacchājātā paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:32.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:32.2: purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:34.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:34.3: atītā cetanā paccuppannānaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:35.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:35.2: paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:35.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:37.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:37.2: vipāko paccuppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.19:39.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.19:39.9: paccuppannā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:39.10: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:39.17: paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:41.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:43.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:44.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.19:47.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane ekaṃ, kamme dve, vipāke āhāre ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.19:50.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:51.1: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:52.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.19:56.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi … pe … nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve.
patthana1.19:59.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye … pe … nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.19:62.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ (imesu padesu ekaṃyeva), avigate ekaṃ.
